alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, NORTHWESTERN LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN BROWN AND SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Manchester, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, West Union, Manchester, Ripley, Aberdeen, Lewisburg, Tollesboro, Trinity, Bradysville, Mays Lick, Rectorville, Epworth, Ribolt, Bentonville, Helena, South Ripley, Tuckahoe, Moranburg, and Mount Gilead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
